sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- <CharacterGeneratorRollerNew :gameSystemName="gameSystem.value?.name"
                               :loading="loading"
                               :dropdownOptions="dropdownOptions" /> -->
  <CharacterCardNew :dropdownOptions="dropdownOptions"
                    :generatorSelectedOptions="generatorSelectedOptions"
                    :loading="loading" />
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, reactive } from 'vue'

import CharacterGeneratorRollerNew from './CharacterGeneratorRollerNew.vue';
import CharacterCardNew from '../Cards/CharacterCardNew.vue';

const props = defineProps({
  gameSystemKey: String
});

const loading = ref(true);
const baseUrl = 'http://localhost:3000/api/v1/character_generator';
const gameSystem = reactive({});
const dropdownOptions = reactive({});

// Move into api file?
function fetchBaseData () {
  fetch(`${baseUrl}/base_data/${gameSystem.value.id}`, {
    method: 'get'
  }).then((res) => {
    return res.json();
  }).then((res) => {
    dropdownOptions.value = {
      ancestries: res.ancestries || [],
      characterClasses: res.player_classes || [],
      nameGenders: res.gender_options || [],
      nameStyles: res.name_styles || [],
      backgrounds: res.backgrounds || [],
      appearances: res.appearances || []
    }
  });
  loading.value = false;
}

fetch(`${baseUrl}/game_system/${props.gameSystemKey}`, {
  method: 'get'
}).then((res) => {
  return res.json();
}).then((res) => {
  gameSystem.value = res.game_system;
  fetchBaseData();
});

const baseOptions = {
  ancestry: null,
  appearance: null,
  background: null,
  characterClass: null
};
const subOptions = {
  lineage: null,
  characterSubclass: null
};
const generatorSpecific = {
  nameGender: 'any',
  nameStyle: null
};

// Generator selected data
const generatorSelectedOptions = ref({
  ...baseOptions,
  ...subOptions,
  ...generatorSpecific
});

// Need to be able to call for generator OR card :/
function fetchLineages () {
  fetch(`${baseUrl}/lineages/${gameSystem.value.id}/${generatorSelectedOptions.value.ancestry}`, {
    method: 'get'
  }).then((res) => {
    return res.json();
  }).then((res) => {
    cardDropdownOptions.value.lineages = res.lineages;
  });
}

function fetchCharacterSubclasses () {
  fetch(`${baseUrl}/player_subclasses/${gameSystem.value.id}/${generatorSelectedOptions.value.characterClass}`, {
    method: 'get'
  }).then((res) => {
    return res.json();
  }).then((res) => {
    cardDropdownOptions.value.characterSubclasses = res.player_subclasses;
  });
}

// Card data
const cardSelectedOptions = ref({
  ...baseOptions,
  ...subOptions
});

function setCardSelectedOptions (optionKey, newVal) {
  // TODO: stronger typing
  cardSelectedOptions[optionKey] = newVal;
}

const cardDropdownOptions = ref({
  characterSubclasses: [],
  lineages: []
});

function generateAncestry () {
  const ancestryIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * dropdownOptions.value.ancestries.length);
  const ancestryId = dropdownOptions.value.ancestries[ancestryIndex].id;
  return ancestryId;
}

function generateAppearance () {
  const appearanceIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * (dropdownOptions.value.appearances.length));
  return dropdownOptions.value.appearances[appearanceIndex].id;
}

function generateBackground () {
  const backgroundIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * (dropdownOptions.value.backgrounds.length));
  return dropdownOptions.value.backgrounds[backgroundIndex].id;
}

function generateCharacterClass () {
  const characterClassIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * dropdownOptions.value.ancestries.length);
  return dropdownOptions.value.ancestries[characterClassIndex].id;
}

function generateCharacterSubclass () {
  fetchCharacterSubclasses(baseOptions.value.characterClass, (characterSubclasses) => { cardDropdownOptions.value.characterSubclasses = characterSubclasses });
  const subclassIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * cardDropdownOptions.value.characterSubclasses.length);
  return cardDropdownOptions.value.characterSubclasses[subclassIndex];
}

function generateLineage () {
  fetchLineages(baseOptions.value.ancestry, (lineages) => { cardDropdownOptions.value.lineages = lineages })
  const lineageIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * cardDropdownOptions.value.lineages.length);
  return cardDropdownOptions.value.lineages[lineageIndex];
}

function rollNewCharacter () {
  Object.keys(baseOptions.value).forEach(key => {
    if (generatorSelectedOptions[key] !== cardSelectedOptions[key]) {
      setCardSelectedOptions(key, generatorSelectedOptions[key]);
    } else {
      switch (key) {
        case 'ancestry':
          setCardSelectedOptions(key, generateAncestry());
          break;
        case 'appearance':
          setCardSelectedOptions(key, generateAppearance());
          break;
        case 'background':
          setCardSelectedOptions(key, generateBackground());
          break;
        case 'characterClass':
          setCardSelectedOptions(key, generateCharacterClass());
          break;
        default:
          break;
      }
    }
  });

  Object.keys(subOptions).forEach(key => {
    if (generatorSelectedOptions[key] !== cardSelectedOptions[key]) {
      setCardSelectedOptions(key, generatorSelectedOptions[key]);
    } else {
      switch (key) {
        case 'lineage':
          setCardSelectedOptions(key, generateLineage);
          break;
        case 'characterSubclass':
          setCardSelectedOptions(key, generateCharacterSubclass);
          break;
        default:
          break;
      }
    }
  });
}
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">
@import "./CharacterGeneratorPage.scss";
</style>
